Welcome to Radio Telescope’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class telescope.Telescope(observer)[source]¶
getTime()[source]¶

Return a astropy.time.Time time object with a datetime format

printTelescope()[source]¶

Print information about the telescope to the screen

record(outFile=None)[source]¶

Records radio signals to an outfile. If no file is specified, it records to a .txt file with the current date and time as the title.

outFile : str
Name of the file to write to
slewToCoord(ra, dec, time=None)[source]¶

Slew the telescope to a given AltAz

ra : float
Right Ascension in degrees
dec : float
Declination in degrees
time : ~astropy.time.Time (optional)
Time of the observation. If left blank, it will default to the current time.
slewToObject(obj)[source]¶

Slew the telescope to an object

obj : ~astroplan.FixedTarget
Object to observe
trackObject(obj)[source]¶

Track an object through the sky

obj : ~astroplan.FixedTarget
Object to track
